command.name: command
command.doc: Executable path of software, such as lmp_serial, lmp_mpi and vasp_gpu, vasp_std, etc.

batch_type.name: batch_type
batch_type.doc: The batch job system type. Option: DistributedShell, LSF, DpCloudServer, Torque, PBS, Slurm, Shell

local_root.name: local_root
local_root.doc: The dir where the tasks and relating files locate. Typically the project dir.

remote_root.name: remote_root
remote_root.doc: The dir where the tasks are executed on the remote machine. Only needed when context is not lazy-local.

clean_asynchronously.name: clean_asynchronously
clean_asynchronously.doc: Clean the remote directory asynchronously after the job finishes.

remote_profile.name: remote_profile
remote_profile.doc: The information used to maintain the connection with remote machine.

image_name.name: image_name
image_name.doc: Name of the image which run the job, optional when platform is not ali/oss.

disk_size.name: disk_size
disk_size.doc: disk size (GB), optional when platform is not ali/oss.

checkpoint_files.name: checkpoint_files
checkpoint_files.doc: location of checkpoint files when it is list type. record file changes when it is string value 'sync_files'

checkpoint_time.name: checkpoint_time
checkpoint_time.doc: interval of checkpoint data been stored minimum 15.

backward_files.name: backward_files
backward_files.doc: which files to be uploaded to remote resources. Upload all the files when it is None or empty.

remote_profile.name: remote_profile
remote_profile.doc: The information used to maintain the connection with remote machine. This field is empty for this context.

remote_profile.name: remote_profile
remote_profile.doc: The information used to maintain the connection with remote machine. This field is empty for this context.

remote_profile.name: remote_profile
remote_profile.doc: The information used to maintain the connection with remote machine. This field is empty for this context.

remote_profile.name: remote_profile
remote_profile.doc: The information used to maintain the connection with remote machine.

hostname.name: hostname
hostname.doc: hostname or ip of ssh connection.

key_filename.name: key_filename
key_filename.doc: key filename used by ssh connection. If left None, find key in ~/.ssh or use password for login

passphrase.name: passphrase
passphrase.doc: passphrase of key used by ssh connection

totp_secret.name: totp_secret
totp_secret.doc: Time-based one time password secret. It should be a base32-encoded string extracted from the 2D code.

context_type.doc: The connection used to remote machine. Option: DpCloudServerContext, LazyLocalContext, SSHContext, LocalContext, HDFSContext

number_node.name: number_node
number_node.doc: The number of node need for each `job`

cpu_per_node.name: cpu_per_node
cpu_per_node.doc: cpu numbers of each node assigned to each job.

gpu_per_node.name: gpu_per_node
gpu_per_node.doc: gpu numbers of each node assigned to each job.

queue_name.name: queue_name
queue_name.doc: The queue name of batch job scheduler system.

custom_flags.name: custom_flags
custom_flags.doc: The extra lines pass to job submitting script header

strategy.name: strategy
strategy.doc: strategies we use to generation job submitting scripts.

para_deg.name: para_deg
para_deg.doc: Decide how many tasks will be run in parallel.

source_list.name: source_list
source_list.doc: The env file to be sourced before the command execution.

module_unload_list.name: module_unload_list
module_unload_list.doc: The modules to be unloaded on HPC system before submitting jobs

module_list.name: module_list
module_list.doc: The modules to be loaded on HPC system before submitting jobs

envs.name: envs
envs.doc: The environment variables to be exported on before submitting jobs

kwargs.name: kwargs
kwargs.doc: Extra arguments.

kwargs.name: kwargs
kwargs.doc: This field is empty for this batch.

kwargs.doc: This field is empty for this batch.

kwargs.name: kwargs
kwargs.doc: Extra arguments.

gpu_usage.name: gpu_usage
gpu_usage.doc: Choosing if GPU is used in the calculation step.

gpu_new_syntax.name: gpu_new_syntax
gpu_new_syntax.doc: For LFS >= 10.1.0.3, new option -gpu for #BSUB could be used. If False, and old syntax would be used.

gpu_exclusive.name: gpu_exclusive
gpu_exclusive.doc: Only take effect when new syntax enabled. Control whether submit tasks in exclusive way for GPU.

batch_type.doc: The batch job system type loaded from machine/batch_type.
